answers.answer: First I would suggest that you don't drive at this point.  Second, see an electrophysiologist, either here at CCF or at Mayo.  Differential diagnosis is long.  Depending on how long you have been a diabetic this could be due to autonomic dysfunction associated with diabetes.  Otherwise there are various heart and vascular conditions that could cause this.  I would recommend wearing an event monitor to try to capture some of these episodes.
